sources.title: Young Bill Hickok
sources.description: A yodeling Bill Hickok, assisted by Calamity Jane, is after a foreign agent and his guerrilla band.

sources.title: Young Bill Hickok (1940) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Julie Bishop
Director: Joseph Kane

Bill Hickok, assisted by Calamity Jane, is after a foreign agent and his guerrilla band who are trying to take over some western territory just as the Civil War is coming to a close.

sources.title: Young Bill Hickok (1940) American Western film directed by Joseph Kane and starring Roy Rogers
sources.description:
Bill Hickok... pathfinder... plainsman... pioneer... Reliving America's most colorful days!
Bill Hickok, assisted by Calamity Jane, is after a foreign agent and his guerrilla band who are trying to take over some western territory just as the Civil War is coming to a close.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/-KVlufKEuWg


Original title: Young Bill Hickok (1940)
This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: Norton S. Parker, Olive Cooper 
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Julie Bishop 
Genres: Western, Drama, Musical


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:09 In a Wild West setting, Nicolas Tower joins forces with Morell and Senator Tucker for a gold-seeking venture.
07:38 Legendary cowboy Wild Bill Hickok saves the day and receives a reward in a Western film.
11:12 Events unfold as Hickok recovers from injuries, plans are made for a gold shipment, and a wedding is imminent.
19:14 A conflict arises as Bill prepares to transport gold, jeopardizing his wedding and safety.
21:36 Intrigue unfolds as characters pursue stolen gold in a Western film set in a tumultuous era.
27:36 In a Western film, suspicions arise about a gold robbery involving Bill Hickok and Nicolas Tower.
36:48 Intrigue unfolds as Bill Hickok faces the Overland Raiders, Tower's schemes, and a gold robbery in a Western town.
42:07 In a Western film, suspicions arise about a group's involvement in gold theft and potential plans to take over California after the Civil War.
46:01 Cowboy-themed film featuring a plot to wreck the Union, a chase for stolen gold, and a cowboy wedding.

metadata.Plot: Bill Hickok in his early pre-gunslinger years as a freight-line agent protecting a gold shipment from villains out to steal gold and land out west while America is diverted by the Civil War back east. With the help of Calamity Jane and her horse-trader uncle, Hickok battles the bad guys while trying to win the love of his life, Louise, in a formulaic B western adventure with songs.
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Julie Bishop
